rewrite1: Begin by formatting the initial paragraph with a Level 1 Outline and set the line spacing precisely to 12 points. Then, for the text you've selected, change the font color to Indigo and reduce the font size to 48 points.
rewrite2: Begin by formatting the initial paragraph with a Level 1 Outline and setting the line spacing precisely to 12 points. For the section of text you've selected, change the font color to Indigo and reduce the font size to 48 points.
rewrite3: Begin by formatting the initial paragraph with a Level 1 Outline and set the line spacing precisely to 12 points. For the selected text you wish to emphasize, change the font color to Indigo and reduce the font size to 48 points.
